00030    StructureFactorP::StructureFactorP(System& system) 
00031     : SystemDiagnostic<System>(system)
00032    {}
00033 
00034    StructureFactorP::~StructureFactorP()

00038    void StructureFactorP::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00039    {
00040 
00041       // Read interval and parameters for AutoCorrArray
00042       //SystemDiagnostic<System>::readParam(in);
00043       readInterval(in);
00044       readOutputFileName(in);
00045 
00046       nAtomType_ = system().simulation().nAtomType();
00047 
00048       read<int>(in, "nAtomTypeIdPair", nAtomTypeIdPair_);
00049       atomTypeIdPairs_.allocate(nAtomTypeIdPair_);
00050       readDArray< Pair<int> >(in, "atomTypeIdPairs", atomTypeIdPairs_, 
00051                                                      nAtomTypeIdPair_);
00052 
00053       read<int>(in, "nWave", nWave_);
00054       waveIntVectors_.allocate(nWave_);
00055       readDArray<IntVector>(in, "waveIntVectors", waveIntVectors_, nWave_);
00056 
00057       waveVectors_.allocate(nWave_);
00058       fourierModes_.allocate(nWave_, nAtomType_ + 1);
00059       structureFactors_.allocate(nWave_, nAtomTypeIdPair_);
00060 
00061       isInitialized_ = true;
00062    }
00063 
00064    /*
00065    * Setup immediately before simulation.
00066    */
00067    void StructureFactorP::setup() 
00068    {
00069       if (!isInitialized_) {
00070          UTIL_THROW("Object not initialized");
00071       }
00072       assert (nWave_ > 0);
00073       assert (nAtomTypeIdPair_ > 0);
00074 
00075       // Clear accumulators
00076       int i, j;
00077       for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00078          for (j = 0; j < nAtomTypeIdPair_; ++j) {
00079             structureFactors_(i, j) = 0.0;
00080          }
00081       }
00082       nSample_ = 0;
00083 
00084    }
00085  
00087    void StructureFactorP::sample(long iStep) 
00088    {
00089       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00090 
00091          Vector  position;
00092          std::complex<double> expFactor;
00093          double  product;
00094          System::ConstMoleculeIterator  molIter;
00095          Molecule::ConstAtomIterator  atomIter;
00096          int  nSpecies, iSpecies, typeId, i;
00097 
00098          makeWaveVectors();
00099 
00100          // Set all Fourier modes to zero
00101          for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00102             for (typeId = 0; typeId <= nAtomType_; ++typeId) {
00103                fourierModes_(i, typeId) = std::complex<double>(0.0, 0.0);
00104             }
00105          }
00106  
00107          // Loop over all atoms
00108          nSpecies = system().simulation().nSpecies();
00109          for (iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies; ++iSpecies) {
00110             system().begin(iSpecies, molIter); 
00111             for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00112                molIter->begin(atomIter); 
00113                for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00114                   position = atomIter->position();
00115                   typeId   = atomIter->typeId();
00116  
00117         // Loop over wavevectors
00118                   for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00119                
00120                      product = position.dot(waveVectors_[i]);
00121                      expFactor = exp( product*Constants::Im );
00122                      fourierModes_(i, typeId)     += expFactor;
00123                      fourierModes_(i, nAtomType_) += expFactor;
00124        
00125                   }
00126   
00127                }
00128             }
00129 
00130          }
00131 
00132          // Increment structure factors
00133          std::complex<double> rho[2];
00134          double  volume = system().boundary().volume();
00135          int     j, k;
00136          for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00137             for (j = 0; j < nAtomTypeIdPair_; ++j) {
00138                for (k = 0; k < 2; ++k) {
00139                   typeId = atomTypeIdPairs_[j][k];
00140                   if (typeId >= 0) {
00141                      rho[k] = fourierModes_(i, typeId);
00142                   } else {
00143                      rho[k] = fourierModes_(i, nAtomType_);
00144                   }
00145                }
00146                rho[0] = std::conj(rho[0]);
00147                structureFactors_(i, j) += std::real(rho[0]*rho[1])/volume;
00148             }
00149          }
00150 
00151          ++nSample_;
00152 
00153       }
00154 
00155    }
00156 
00160    void StructureFactorP::makeWaveVectors() 
00161    {
00162       Vector    dWave;
00163       Boundary* boundaryPtr = &system().boundary();
00164       int       i, j;
00165 
00166       // Calculate wavevectors
00167       for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00168          waveVectors_[i] = Vector::Zero;
00169          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00170             dWave  = boundaryPtr->reciprocalBasisVector(j);
00171             dWave *= waveIntVectors_[i][j];
00172             waveVectors_[i] += dWave;
00173             //std::cout << waveVectors_[i] << std::endl;
00174          }
00175       }
00176    }
00177 
00178    void StructureFactorP::output() 
00179    {
00180       double      value;
00181       int         i, j, k;
00182 
00183       // Echo parameters to a log file
00184       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00185       writeParam(outputFile_); 
00186       outputFile_.close();
00187 
00188       // Output structure factors to one file
00189       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00190       for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00191          for (k = 0; k < Dimension; ++k) {
00192             outputFile_ << Int(waveIntVectors_[i][k], 5);
00193          }
00194          outputFile_ << Dbl(waveVectors_[i].abs(), 20, 8);
00195          for (j = 0; j < nAtomTypeIdPair_; ++j) {
00196             value = structureFactors_(i, j)/double(nSample_);
00197             outputFile_ << Dbl(value, 18, 8);
00198          }
00199          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00200       }
00201       outputFile_.close();
00202 
00203       #if 0
00204       // Output each structure factor to a separate file
00205       std::string suffix;
00206       int         typeId;
00207       for (j = 0; j < nAtomTypeIdPair_; ++j) {
00208 
00209          // Construct file suffix for this structure factor
00210          suffix = std::string(".");
00211          for (k = 0; k < 2; k++) {
00212             typeId = atomTypeIdPairs_[j][k];
00213             if (typeId < 0) {
00214                suffix += std::string("A");
00215             } else {
00216                suffix += toString(typeId);
00217             }
00218          }
00219          suffix += std::string(".dat");
00220 
00221          fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(suffix), outputFile_);
00222 
00223          // Loop over waves to output structure factor
00224          for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00225             for (k = 0; k < Dimension; ++k) {
00226                outputFile_ << Int(waveIntVectors_[i][k], 5);
00227             }
00228             outputFile_ << Dbl(waveVectors_[i].abs(), 20, 8);
00229             value = structureFactors_(i, j)/double(nSample_);
00230             outputFile_ << Dbl(value, 20, 8);
00231             outputFile_ << std::endl;
00232          }
00233 
00234          outputFile_.close();
00235       }
00236       #endif
00237 
00238    }
